des: "This recipe is enough for about one pound of pasta.  Enjoy!"
ins: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine half-and-half and milk.  Heat through, then reduce heat to low and stir in egg yolks and and cheese, a little at a time, until well incorporated.  Simmer 5 to 10 minutes, until thick, stirring occasionally.  Stir in salt and pepper to taste and toss with hot pasta.
